definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: The headmaster caned the boys for disobedience.
sentences.chinese: 校長用藤條責打不聽話的男學生。

sentences.english: I gave your children blows to no purpose;
sentences.chinese: 我責打你們的兒女是徒然的，他們不受懲治。

sentences.english: Why should you be beaten anymore? Why do you persist in rebellion?
sentences.chinese: 你們爲什麼屢次悖逆，還要受責打嗎？
減少責打對抗步兵的損失。

sentences.english: Rebuke is more effective for a wise man than a hundred blows on a fool.
sentences.chinese: 一句責備話入聰明人的心，強如責打愚昧人一百下。
